Filament 1.47.0 https://github.com/google/filament/releases/tag/v1.47.0
Assimp 5.3.1 https://github.com/assimp/assimp/releases/tag/v5.3.1
	Run following in commandline in root dir after unzipping:
		cmake CMakeLists.txt -DASSIMP_BUILD_TESTS=OFF -DASSIMP_BUILD_ASSIMP_VIEW=OFF
		cmake --build .
		cmake --build . --config Release
SDL 2.28.5 https://github.com/libsdl-org/SDL/releases/tag/release-2.28.5
